title: Relax as Mexico unfolds before your window.
description: Every journey invites you to relax and take in the view. Comfort is part of the experience. Around every bend, Mexico awaits with vibrant flavors, colors, and unforgettable moments.

title: Individual screens
description: Whether you're crossing cities or exploring new landscapes, our spacious, ergonomic seats let you relax in comfort—so you arrive refreshed and ready for your next adventure.

title: Separate restrooms for men and women—always clean and available throughout your journey.
description: Hygiene, maintenance, and availability at all times. Every space is carefully maintained to offer you a safe and comfortable travel experience.

title: Travel in comfort, travel connected.
description: Whether you're sharing moments, working on the go, or relaxing with your favorite playlist, our individual power outlets keep you fully charged throughout the journey.
